channel.title: Comments on: Looking For A Stereo System
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Basically the sales manager at the shop confirmed what most people say - that a dedicated stereo is better than a home theater receiver. He also said I should hear shelf speakers (not just floor speakers) because he thinks at the price range I'm looking for they'd give better sound.
He also explained the different kind of sounds you get from speakers - front stage and backstage for example and reassured me I'll know the difference once I get to listen to proper speakers (I told him I wasn't sure I have an ear for these things)
item.content:encoded:
Basically the sales manager at the shop confirmed what most people say – that a dedicated stereo is better than a home theater receiver. He also said I should hear shelf speakers (not just floor speakers) because he thinks at the price range I’m looking for they’d give better sound.

He also explained the different kind of sounds you get from speakers – front stage and backstage for example and reassured me I’ll know the difference once I get to listen to proper speakers (I told him I wasn’t sure I have an ear for these things)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: So, what was the first time like, what new information did u get?
item.content:encoded: So, what was the first time like, what new information did u get?
